translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and the even and the odd,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and the night when it passes!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: هَلْ فِى ذَٰلِكَ قَسَمٌ لِّذِى حِجْرٍ

translations.text: Is all this ˹not˺ a sufficient oath for those who have sense?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Hal fee thalika qasamun lithee hijr
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِعَادٍ

translations.text: Did you not see how your Lord dealt with ’Ȃd—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Alam tara kayfa faAAala rabbuka biAAad
translations.resource_name: Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ٱلَّتِى لَمْ يُخْلَقْ مِثْلُهَا فِى ٱلْبِلَـٰدِ

translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Allatee lam yukhlaq mithluha fee albilad
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: and Thamûd who carved ˹their homes into˺ the rocks in the ˹Stone˺ Valley;
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and the Pharaoh of mighty structures?<sup foot_note=77618>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: They all transgressed throughout the land,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: So your Lord unleashed on them a scourge of punishment.<sup foot_note=77619>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَأَمَّا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ إِذَا مَا ٱبْتَلَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَأَكْرَمَهُۥ وَنَعَّمَهُۥ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّىٓ أَكْرَمَنِ

translations.text: Now, whenever a human being is tested by their Lord through ˹His˺ generosity and blessings, they boast, “My Lord has ˹deservedly˺ honoured me!”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faamma al-insanu itha maibtalahu rabbuhu faakramahu wanaAAAAamahu fayaqoolu rabbeeakraman
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَمَّآ إِذَا مَا ٱبْتَلَىٰهُ فَقَدَرَ عَلَيْهِ رِزْقَهُۥ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّىٓ أَهَـٰنَنِ

translations.text: But when He tests them by limiting their provision, they protest, “My Lord has ˹undeservedly˺ humiliated me!”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waamma itha ma ibtalahufaqadara AAalayhi rizqahu fayaqoolu rabbee ahanan
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Absolutely not! In fact, you are not ˹even˺ gracious to the orphan,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: nor do you urge one another to feed the poor.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: And you devour ˹others’˺ inheritance greedily,<sup foot_note=77620>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: كَلَّآ إِذَا دُكَّتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ دَكًّا دَكًّا

translations.text: Enough! When the earth is entirely crushed over and over,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and your Lord comes ˹to judge˺ with angels, rank upon rank,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَجِا۟ىٓءَ يَوْمَئِذٍۭ بِجَهَنَّمَ ۚ يَوْمَئِذٍ يَتَذَكَّرُ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰ

translations.text: and Hell is brought forth on that Day—this is when every ˹disbelieving˺ person will remember ˹their own sins˺. But what is the use of remembering then?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wajee-a yawma-ithin bijahannamayawma-ithin yatathakkaru al-insanu waannalahu aththikra
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: They will cry, “I wish I had sent forth ˹something good˺ for my ˹true˺ life.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: On that Day He will punish ˹them˺ severely, like no other,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and bind ˹them˺ tightly, like no other.<sup foot_note=77621>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: ˹Allah will say to the righteous,˺ “O tranquil soul!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Return to your Lord, well pleased ˹with Him˺ and well pleasing ˹to Him˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
